from.S: radar.measurement f inner join radar.live_pitch_data l on f.measurementid = l.measurementid inner join crosscheck.tags t on f.measurementid = t.measurement_id

select.S: t.game_id,SUM(CASE WHEN l.releasedata_releasespeed_value > 0 AND f.pitchsegment_launchdata_releasespeed_value > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS radar_valid_pitches,2.23694*AVG(l.releasedata_releasespeed_value - f.pitchsegment_launchdata_releasespeed_value) AS relspeed_radar_livefinal_delta_avg,2.23694*SUM(l.releasedata_releasespeed_value - f.pitchsegment_launchdata_releasespeed_value) AS relspeed_radar_livefinal_delta_sum,39.3701*AVG(l.trajectorydata_scoringheight_value - f.pitchsegment_balltrajectory_scoringheight_value) AS plh_radar_livefinal_delta_avg,39.3701*SUM(l.trajectorydata_scoringheight_value - f.pitchsegment_balltrajectory_scoringheight_value) AS plh_radar_livefinal_delta_sum,39.3701*AVG(l.trajectorydata_scoringside_value - f.pitchsegment_balltrajectory_scoringside_value) AS pls_radar_livefinal_delta_avg,39.3701* SUM(l.trajectorydata_scoringside_value - f.pitchsegment_balltrajectory_scoringside_value) AS pls_radar_livefinal_delta_sum, getdate() as date_processed
